df['headline_clean'] = {
  df['headline_text'].str.lower()
  .pipe(hero.remove_digits)
  .pipe(hero.remove_punctuation)
  .pipe(hero.remove_diacritics)
  .pipe(hero.remove_stopwords)
}

df['pca_clean'] = {
  df['headline_clean']
  .pipe(hero.tokenize)
  .pipe(hero.tfidf)
  .pipe(hero.pca)
}

hero.scatterplot(df, 'pca_clean', color='headline_category')
